short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your AI copilot for online interviews, which identifies questions and suggests answers based on your experience and job requirements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your interview performance with JobJump, your real-time AI-powered assistant designed to help you excel during video interviews. Our AI Copilot provides tailored answer suggestions, whether you're answering questions or tackling coding challenges, ensuring you're fully prepared and confident to ace your interview and land your dream job.

üåê Seamless Integration
Integrates directly with video conferencing platforms like Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams, providing assistance without disrupting your interview or requiring you to leave the page.

üéØ Real-Time AI Assistance
Transcribes the interviewer's questions and offers instant answer hints, enabling you to craft well-informed and articulate responses in real time.

üì∑ Visual Recognition 
Automatically generates answer hints after a single screenshot, empowering you to ace coding interviews and online assessments effortlessly.

üîß Effortless Interaction
Enables click-free interaction, allowing you to engage confidently with the interviewer, enhancing your overall interview experience.

For any questions or support, please contact us at jobjump@newportai.com.
